name: Linux Meterpreter, Reverse TCP Inline
author: Adam Cammack <adam_cammack@rapid7.com>
Brent Cook <brent_cook@rapid7.com>
timwr
description: Run the Meterpreter / Mettle server payload (stageless)

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: VERBOSE
options.description: Enable detailed status messages

options.name: LHOST
options.description: The listen address (an interface may be specified)

options.name: LPORT
options.description: The listen port

options.name: ReverseListenerBindPort
options.description: The port to bind to on the local system if different from LPORT

options.name: ReverseAllowProxy
options.description: Allow reverse tcp even with Proxies specified. Connect back will NOT go through proxy but directly to LHOST

options.name: ReverseListenerComm
options.description: The specific communication channel to use for this listener

options.name: ReverseListenerBindAddress
options.description: The specific IP address to bind to on the local system

options.name: ReverseListenerThreaded
options.description: Handle every connection in a new thread (experimental)

options.name: StagerRetryCount
options.description: The number of times the stager should retry if the first connect fails

options.name: StagerRetryWait
options.description: Number of seconds to wait for the stager between reconnect attempts

options.name: AutoLoadStdapi
options.description: Automatically load the Stdapi extension

options.name: AutoVerifySession
options.description: Automatically verify and drop invalid sessions

options.name: AutoVerifySessionTimeout
options.description: Timeout period to wait for session validation to occur, in seconds

options.name: InitialAutoRunScript
options.description: An initial script to run on session creation (before AutoRunScript)

options.name: AutoRunScript
options.description: A script to run automatically on session creation.

options.name: AutoSystemInfo
options.description: Automatically capture system information on initialization.

options.name: EnableUnicodeEncoding
options.description: Automatically encode UTF-8 strings as hexadecimal

options.name: HandlerSSLCert
options.description: Path to a SSL certificate in unified PEM format, ignored for HTTP transports

options.name: SessionRetryTotal
options.description: Number of seconds try reconnecting for on network failure

options.name: SessionRetryWait
options.description: Number of seconds to wait between reconnect attempts

options.name: SessionExpirationTimeout
options.description: The number of seconds before this session should be forcibly shut down

options.name: SessionCommunicationTimeout
options.description: The number of seconds of no activity before this session should be killed

options.name: PayloadProcessCommandLine
options.description: The displayed command line that will be used by the payload

options.name: AutoUnhookProcess
options.description: Automatically load the unhook extension and unhook the process

options.name: PingbackRetries
options.description: How many additional successful pingbacks

options.name: PingbackSleep
options.description: Time (in seconds) to sleep between pingbacks

options.name: PayloadUUIDSeed
options.description: A string to use when generating the payload UUID (deterministic)

options.name: PayloadUUIDRaw
options.description: A hex string representing the raw 8-byte PUID value for the UUID

options.name: PayloadUUIDName
options.description: A human-friendly name to reference this unique payload (requires tracking)

options.name: PayloadUUIDTracking
options.description: Whether or not to automatically register generated UUIDs
